Heading: Rising discount
Note: Discount applied to all units in a qualifying order. The default if no <DiscountType> is specified

Heading: Rising discount (cumulative)
Note: Additional discount may be applied retrospectively, based on number of units ordered over a specific period

Heading: Progressive discount
Note: Discount applied to marginal units in a qualifying order

Heading: Progressive discount (cumulative)
Note: Previous orders within a specific time period are counted when calculating a progressive discount
